abstract.text: A Boolean value indicating whether the collection contains all specified elements.
The size to fit all sizes of the collection.
Splits the collection by the key returned from the specified closure and values that are returned for each key.
The union of all rectangles in the collection.
Returns the advanced index for the specified current element and advance type.
The average value of all values in the collection. If the collection is empty, it returns 0.
Splits the collection by the specified keypath and values that are returned for each keypath.
Creates a new dictionary whose keys are the groupings returned by the given closure and whose values are arrays of the elements that returned each key.
The total size of the data sizes in the collection.
The total sum value of all values in the collection. If the collection is empty, it returns 0.
Returns a new attributed string by concatenating the elements of the sequence, adding the given separator between each element.
The total sum value of all values in the collection. If the collection is empty, it returns 0.
Creates a new dictionary whose keys are the groupings returned by the given closure and whose values are arrays of the elements that returned each key.
Splits the collection into arrays for each specified unique keypath value.
- Parameters keyPath: The keyPath of the value.
- Returns: Returns an array of chunks for each unique keypath value.
Splits the collection into arrays for each specified unique comparison value.
- Parameters comparison: A comparison handler returning a comparable value.
- Returns: Returns an array of chunks for each unique comparison value.
Returns a flattened array of all collection elements.
Splits the collection into arrays with the specified size.
Returns the advanced element for the specified current element and advance type.
Splits the collection into arrays by the specified amount.
Returns an array of random elements of the collection.
Returns a flattened array of all collection elements.
Returns the first index of the specified element.
The average size of the data sizes in the collection.
Returns a random element of the collection excluding the specified elements.
Returns the indexes of the specified elements.
Returns a new attributed string by concatenating the elements of the sequence, adding the given separator between each element.
The average value of all values in the collection. If the collection is empty, it returns 0.
Returns an array of random elements of the collection.
Returns an array of random elements excluding the specified elements.
Returns a flattened array of all elements.
A Boolean value indicating whether the collection contains any of the specified elements.
Splits the collection into arrays for each specified unique keypath value.
- Parameters keyPath: The keyPath of the value.
- Returns: Returns an array of chunks for each unique keypath value.
